name: arcane
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mysterious and known only by a few people: He was the only person who understood all the arcane details of the agreement. This argument may seem arcane to those not closely involved in the world of finance.

complicated and therefore understood or known by only a few people: They worked hard to negotiate New York's arcane rules for getting on presidential ballots.
